verses.verse: לַמְנַצֵּ֬חַ׀ <S%H5329><s%> lam-natz-Tze-acho the chief Musician לִבְנֵי־ <S%H1121><s%> [Tliv-nei-for the sons קֹ֬רַח <S%H7141><s%> Ko-rach of Korah מִזְמֽוֹר׃ <S%H4210><s%> miz-Mor. A Psalm כָּֽל־ <S%H3605><s%> kal- all הָ֭עַמִּים <S%H5971><s%> Ha-'am-mim all ye people תִּקְעוּ־ <S%H8628><s%> tik-'u- O clap כָ֑ף <S%H3709><s%> Chaf; your hands הָרִ֥יעוּ <S%H7321><s%> ha-Ri-'u shout לֵ֝אלֹהִ֗ים <S%H430><s%> le-lo-Him, unto God בְּק֣וֹל <S%H6963><s%> be-Kol with the voice רִנָּֽה׃ <S%H7440><s%> rin-Nah. of triumph

כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- For יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh For the LORD עֶלְי֣וֹן <S%H5945><s%> el-Yon most high נוֹרָ֑א <S%H3372><s%> no-Ra; [is] terrible מֶ֥לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> Me-lech King גָּ֝דוֹל <S%H1419><s%> Ga-dol [he is] a great עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- over כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- all הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <S%H776><s%> ha-'A-retz. over all the earth

יַדְבֵּ֣ר <S%H1696><s%> yad-Ber He shall subdue עַמִּ֣ים <S%H5971><s%> 'am-Mim the people תַּחְתֵּ֑ינוּ <S%H8478><s%> tach-Tei-nu; under וּ֝לְאֻמִּ֗ים <S%H3816><s%> u-le-'um-Mim, under us and the nations תַּ֣חַת <S%H8478><s%> Ta-chat under רַגְלֵֽינוּ׃ <S%H7272><s%> rag-Lei-nu. under our feet

יִבְחַר־ <S%H977><s%> yiv-char- He shall choose לָ֥נוּ La-nu אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- נַחֲלָתֵ֑נוּ <S%H5159><s%> na-cha-la-Te-nu; our inheritance אֶ֥ת <S%H853><s%> 'et גְּא֨וֹן <S%H1347><s%> ge-'on for us the excellency יַעֲקֹ֖ב <S%H3290><s%> ya-'a-Ko of Jacob אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher- whom אָהֵ֣ב <S%H157><s%> 'a-Hev whom he loved סֶֽלָה׃ <S%H5542><s%> Se-lah. Selah

עָלָ֣ה <S%H5927><s%> 'a-Lah is gone up אֱ֭לֹהִים <S%H430><s%> E-lo-Him God בִּתְרוּעָ֑ה <S%H8643><s%> bit-ru-'Ah; with a shout יְ֝הֹוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh the LORD בְּק֣וֹל <S%H6963><s%> be-Kol with the sound שׁוֹפָֽר׃ <S%H7782><s%> sho-Far. of a trumpet

זַמְּר֣וּ <S%H2167><s%> zam-me-Ru Sing praises אֱלֹהִ֣ים <S%H430><s%> E-lo-Him to God זַמֵּ֑רוּ <S%H2167><s%> zam-Me-ru; sing praises זַמְּר֖וּ <S%H2167><s%> zam-me-Ru sing praises לְמַלְכֵּ֣נוּ <S%H4428><s%> le-mal-Ke-nu unto our King זַמֵּֽרוּ׃ <S%H2167><s%> zam-Me-ru. sing praises

כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> ki for מֶ֖לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> Me-lech [is] the King כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- of all הָאָ֥רֶץ <S%H776><s%> ha-'A-retz of all the earth אֱלֹהִ֗ים <S%H430><s%> E-lo-Him, For God זַמְּר֥וּ <S%H2167><s%> zam-me-Ru sing ye praises מַשְׂכִּֽיל׃ <S%H7919><s%> mas-Kil. with understanding

מָלַ֣ךְ <S%H4427><s%> ma-Lach reigneth אֱ֭לֹהִים <S%H430><s%> E-lo-Him God עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- over גּוֹיִ֑ם <S%H1471><s%> go-Yim; over the heathen אֱ֝לֹהִ֗ים <S%H430><s%> E-lo-Him, God יָשַׁ֤ב׀ <S%H3427><s%> ya-Shav sitteth עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- over כִּסֵּ֬א <S%H3678><s%> kis-Se upon the throne קָדְשֽׁוֹ׃ <S%H6944><s%> ka-de-Sho. of his holiness

נְדִ֘יבֵ֤י <S%H5081><s%> ne-Di-Vei The princes עַמִּ֨ים׀ <S%H5971><s%> 'am-Mim of the people נֶאֱסָ֗פוּ <S%H622><s%> ne-'e-Sa-fu, are gathered together עַם֮ <S%H5971><s%> 'am [even] the people אֱלֹהֵ֪י <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-Hei of the God אַבְרָ֫הָ֥ם <S%H85><s%> 'av-Ra-Ham of Abraham כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> ki for לֵֽ֭אלֹהִים <S%H430><s%> Le-lo-him [belong] unto God מָֽגִנֵּי־ <S%H4043><s%> ma-gin-nei- for the shields אֶ֗רֶץ <S%H776><s%> 'E-retz, of the earth מְאֹ֣ד <S%H3966><s%> me-'Od he is greatly נַעֲלָֽה׃ <S%H5927><s%> na-'a-Lah. exalted
